name: George Likes to Hide
description:
George is a quirky Demon who likes to play hide and seek. He will always let you know if you're cold or hot, but he will also get smaller with every second, so the longer you take, the harder it gets.

You have 60 seconds to find George as many times as you can, with the fewest clicks possible. 

----------------------

Leave a comment with your score and your temperature :)

This game was made in 8 hours for #godotjam, during the World Cup 2018, which is the reason I didn't have a lot of time, also why the game is all green. Go Iceland! \o/ 

The theme for the game jam was Temperature.

-------------------------------------

Art and Programming: @robsonsiebel
